name: Super Gravity Ball
description: Super gravity ball is a gravity manipulating puzzle platformer that takes place in a sprawling galaxy amongst the furthest reaches of the universe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
